data.comment: The first-half is under way at Regenboogstadion - Kortrijk kick-off to start the match.
The first-half has come to a close in Waregem.
In the minute 46, Zulte have kicked-off the second half at Regenboogstadion.
Tomas Chory is on a sub for Gianni Bruno for Zulte.
The home team have replaced Damien Marcq with Bassem Srarfi. This is the second substitution made today by Francky Dury.
In the minute 70, Yves Vanderhaeghe is making the team's first substitution at Regenboogstadion with Mohamed Badamosi replacing Habib Gueye.
Goal! Tomas Chory gives Zulte a 1-0 lead in Waregem.
Yani Van Den Bossche is replacing Michiel Jonckheere for Kortrijk at Regenboogstadion.
In the minute 88, Tomas Chory for Zulte has been booked by Wesli De Cremer and receives a first yellow card.
The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Kortrijk.
The match is over. Final score 1-1.
Daniel Opare (Zulte) has received a yellow card from Wesli De Cremer.
Ilombe Mboyo scores from the spot and Kortrijk draw level at Regenboogstadion.
Jean-Luc Dompe (Zulte) is red-carded and dismissed.
